I think TF2 is a very fun FPS game. It's an absolute classic with a still vibrant community! Plus, the game is free, so anyone can play! The High skill ceiling needed to play well, which rewards good players. There is also a fairly low skill ceiling for other classes, making the game a fun experience for everyone. near perfect game, still holds up after 13 years! Would definitely reccomend.

Aunque a Valve ya no le importe este juego Team Fortress 2 seguirá viviendo con o sin su ayuda, este juego tiene varios puntos a su favor, como lo es lo balanceadas que están todas las clases, no hay ninguna clase rota o invencible, su comunidad es super friendly, muy pocas veces me he encontrado con tóxicos, casi todos los modos de juego en casual son muy divertidos y bien planeados por lo que no resulta ser molesto jugarlos, tiene competitivo por si te interesa empezar a jugar de verdad, aunque esta bastante vacío casi nadie juega ese modo de juego, Mann vs. Machine es como un modo horda en donde deberas derrotar oleadas de robots de cada clase del juego, aunque este último modo de juego cuesta 20 pesos jugar una partida las recompensas que se obtienen valen la pena además es muy divertido .
Si tuviera que decir algo malo es que hay algunos mapas que simplemente no son buenos, o son estúpidamente grandes y te vas a terminar perdiendo o simplemente son malos porque son super lineales, además debido a que Valve ya no le da mantenimiento a los servers, estos se suelen llenar de bots que arruinan por completo la competencia del juego, aunque pueden simplemente kickearlos simplemente sería mejor que no estuvieran en primer lugar, incluso con todos estos defectos, yo creo que Team Fortress 2 es un juego de culto que todo el mundo debería probar, no buscando una experiencia competitiva, solo para divertirse.

Team Fortress 2 is in my opinion, a game where you fight with others to defend or attack, it is very common but the way that VALVe have done it, the serious gameplay with a comedic feel is perfect for those days when you need to take a break. I would suggest this game to most of the more mature players: 13+. One thing is could give as feedback is more basic based servers for beginners to Team Fortress 2 and first person shooters in general. Overall, Team Fortress 2 is great and VALVe should keep developing it.
Loved the game ever since I was introduced to it. My only complaint, is the bots. They can be a bit annoying. But at least they can easily be kicked (Most of the time)

No se por donde empezar, este juego es uno de los mejores en el mundo, no se como puede ser que se mantenga a flote a pesar de todos sus problemas, su comunidad es increíble, siempre tratando de mejorar el juego.

I totally recommend this game for everyone. It's cartoony artstyle, ragdolls, and etc is just perfect.

Well well well, where do i even begin? The amount of content this game has, is just uncountable. If you boot up this game for the first time, hop into a casual match, pick a class that looks most badass and go into the world of TF2, you may just not even know where to start. Demomen and Soldiers flying through the air, Scouts running away from Pyros and Engineers defending the point all at once. If you want to get into this game, go to youtube and watch a tutorial, or practice, no one stops you. Is this game worth a try? ABSOLUTELY! Download it and get into fight soldier!

With a learning curve larger than a Pixar Mom's ass, it can be quite difficult to start with.
But, if you have a friend leading you along, it leads to an amazing experience.

yazacak birşey bulamadım
çiköfte tarifi vereyim
malzemeler:
2,5 su bardağı ince bulgur
1,5 su bardağı sıcak su
1 çay bardağı isot
1 çay bardağı zeytinyağı
3 yemek kaşığı acı toz kırmızı biber
1 yemek kaşığı domates salçası
2 yemek kaşığı biber salçası
4 yemek kaşığı nar ekşisi
1 çay kaşığı tuz
1 adet rendelenmiş soğan
1 adet limon suyu 

Bulgurun üzerine sıcak su döküp suyu çekmesini bekletelim.
Rendelemiş olduğunuz soğanın fazla suyunu tülbent yardımıyla sıkalım.
Bütün malzemeyi robot içine koyup yavaşça robottan çekelim.
Arada robottun ağzını açıp kenarlara yapışan malzemeyi toparlayarak tüm malzemelerin ince çekilmesini sağlayalım.
Tüm malzemelerin karıştığına emin olunca bir yoğurma kabı içerisinde bir kez karıştırıp ceviz büyüklüğünde parçalar alarak şekil verelim.
Bol yeşillikle servisini sağlayın. Afiyet olsun.
Son, always remember, dying is gay!
